# Class Version

[java.lang.Object](https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/Object.html "class or interface in java.lang")

com.google.adk.Version

* * *

public final class Version extends [Object](https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/Object.html "class or interface in java.lang")

Tracks the current ADK version. Useful for tracking headers. Kept as a string literal to avoid coupling with the build system.

  * ## Field Summary

Fields

Modifier and Type

Field

Description

`static final [String](https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/String.html "class or interface in java.lang")`

`JAVA_ADK_VERSION`
